entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
